channel.title: This site needs a LMGTFY button
channel.description: Alright so I know this site runs on SMF, I use the same forums software. On the SMF site they have a mod that adds a Let Me Google That For You [LMGTFY][/LMGTFY] code tags. When you add words into the tag, it generates a link for the site. so if you did [LMGTFY]How to Portforward on a 317[/LMGTFY] it would generate something along these lines: [url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=How+To+portForward+on+a+317]http://lmgtfy.com/?q=How+To+portForward+on+a+317[/url]. I believe it also has a tinyurl conversion so the people getting the link won't know you used it to essentially 'troll' them. Source: [url=http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=2814]here[/url]

item.title: This site needs a LMGTFY button
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

deathschaos9:

Anyone who posted anything remotely racist got an infraction, have a nice day.

Someone is on a bad mood today…

Read full topic

item.title: This site needs a LMGTFY button
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:442430"][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=545057.msg3995652#msg3995652 date=1337220977]

unfortunately due to mitb’s heavy customisations of the forum, trying to install the mod would likely be more hassle than it’s worth

I’d be all for it if it wasn’t a hassle to install

I’ve never seen the insides of this sites forums so I can’t disagree. But I installed it into my forums in about a min or so. Lol but then again, my forums are freshly installed.

This site is more nigger rigged than a car repair in Harlem.
[/quote]

I actually loled[/quote]
Made me smile too actually. Not many people on these forums have a good sense of humor.

Read full topic

item.title: This site needs a LMGTFY button
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:442430"][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=545057.msg3995558#msg3995558 date=1337215250]
As I recall. Most, if not all, veteran Moparians hate when countless noobs post here with the same issue over and over. LMGTFY is a more fun way to help people instead of saying “google it”.
[/quote]

fixed, now leave

also, I’d hardly consider sinisoul a veteran if that’s what you were talking about.[/quote]

Hence why I replied to him.

And I don’t have to leave. It’s a simple suggestion that wasn’t against the rules to post.
Thanks.

item.title: This site needs a LMGTFY button
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

jmood128:

How about not, waste of tag space…

Oh god. a whole 30 pixels that isn’t being used.

sinisoul:

[LMGTFY]no[/LMGTFY]

As I recall. Most, if not all, veteran Moparians hate when countless noobs post here with the same issue over and over. LMGTFY is a more fun way to help people instead of saying “google it”.
